title: Dev Grade
description: DevGrade is a tool to assess your developer profile based on your GitHub activity. It provides a grade reflecting your skills and potential, along with embeddable badges for HTML and React websites to showcase your verified DevGrade.

title: Reserve
description: A full-stack productivity app built with Next.js 15. Helps users stay consistent with clean UI, fast performance, and simple scheduling features.

title: Decision Dex
description: A decision-making tool where users can set priorities, add options, and analyze choices with visual stats. Clarity meets action.

title: Streaksvr
description: Track and build personal streaks with self-assigned tasks. Great for habit-building and self-challenges.

title: Socially
description: A full-stack social media app with explore feed, followers suggestions, likes, posts, and more.
